00044 int Maglib::gen_evaluator
00045 (
00046         const string path_input_file,
00047         const string path_folder_output,
00048         const string name_library,
00049         const vector<string> &headers,
00050         const string path
00051 ) const
00052 {
00053         string path_output(path_folder_output);
00054         /* Ensure that the output path finish at '/'. */
00055         if (path_output[path_output.size()-1] != '/')
00056         {
00057                 path_output.append("/");
00058         }
00059 
00060         /* Parses the input file to get the AG. */
00061         Parser_AG p_mag;
00062         if (p_mag.parse_grammar(path_input_file))
00063         {
00064                 /* Erase and create the output folder */
00065                 if(!utilities::clean_output_folder(path_output))
00066                 {
00067                         cerr << "ERROR: the path " << path_output << " is invalid or inaccessible." << endl;
00068                         return -1;
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 /* Parsing success and is a MAG. Proceed to save. */
00072                 p_mag.save_grammar_file(path_output);
00073 
00074                 /* Start the plan's generation. */
00075                 Builder_plans b_plans(p_mag.get_attr_grammar());
00076                 unsigned short res(b_plans.build_plans());
00077                 if (res == 0)
00078                 {
00079                         /* Success, proceed to save all graphs generated. */
00080                         b_plans.save_all_graphs(path_output);
00081                         /* And saves all plans generated too. */
00082                         b_plans.save_all_plans(path_output);
00083                         b_plans.save_all_plans_project(path_output);
00084 
00085                         /* Begins the visit sequence computation. */
00086                         Builder_visit_sequences b_visit_seq(b_plans, p_mag.get_attr_grammar());
00087                         if (b_visit_seq.generate_visit_sequences())
00088                         {
00089                                 /* Success, the last step is code generation. */
00090                                 Builder_code b_gen(path_output, name_library, p_mag.get_attr_grammar(), b_plans, b_visit_seq);
00091                                 if(b_gen.generate_code(headers, path))
00092                                 {
00093                                         /* Success, the evaluator is completed. */
00094                                         return 0;
00095                                 }
00096                         }
00097                 }
00098                 else if (res == 1)
00099                 {
00100                         /* The graphs generation exits because detects a cyclic graphs of attribute dependencies. */
00101                         b_plans.save_cyclic_graphs(path_output);
00102                         cerr << "ERROR: One o more graph ADP has an cycle in its dependencies. Look the folder " << path_output
00103                         << "graphs/CYCLIC_graphs/ for more details." << endl;
00104                 }
00105         }
00106         /* In this point some step fails. */
00107         return -1;
00108 }
